author: nero_eth
content:
**Quick update on EIP-7928:**
Right now, the proposal comes with state locations + post-tx state diffs. Based on some initial analyses which we don't yet have there will be a decision about removing the state locations or not.
The EIP is still using SSZ format and some people prefer SSZ because of the possibility to create compact proofs. On the other hand RLP would be the easier choice as everything uses RLP on the EL already.

This is a repo used for building BALs and experimenting with different encodings, variants and optimizations:
https://github.com/nerolation/eth-bal-analysis/tree/main

There're also EELS specs with many tests:
https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/compare/forks/osaka...nerolation:execution-specs:bals

 <@968526635735326741>  did a thorough analysis on the worst-case BAL size:
https://notes.ethereum.org/@misilva/r1CyZf_Vlx

Geth, Besu and Erigon are actively working on it and will have a prototype soon
Reth and  Nethermind are waiting for headliner selection
